az: there were 2 people with one wish 2 live a life filled with love 2 god they would pray that 2gether theyd stay under the stars above but someone else made a wish at the same time on the same breath and although the wish 4 love was granted so was this evil wish 4 death now i make a wish sealed with tears and laughter it is my wish that these 2 loves r reunited in the hereafter
